projects.title: Learn a Line
projects.desc: Visualize the learning of a basic neural network by learning a straight line equation.

projects.title: Linear Classifier
projects.desc: Visualize the learning of a linear classifier: learns to distinguish between two different type of points in space that are linearly separable.

projects.title: Deep Iris
projects.desc: Visualize how a multi-layer neural network tries to classify flowers from its petal and sepal dimensions

projects.title: Which Letter?
projects.desc: Visualize the convolutions in recognizing handwritten letters

projects.title: MNIST GAN
projects.desc: Generate handwritten numbers using Generative Adversarial Network fused with a Classifier.

projects.title: Colorizer
projects.desc: A web application that colorizes grayscale images using a Convolutional Neural Network. This was my major project in my undergrad.

projects.title: MNIST GAN
projects.desc: Generate handwritten numbers using Generative Adversarial Network.

projects.title: Next Char
projects.desc: Visualize how a Recurrent Neural Network predicts which letter comes next.
